name: Galeria Plaza Veracruz

reviews.text: Overall, the Galeria Plaza is a pretty good hotel. The rooms are clean and comfortable, the staff is nice, the common areas are nice and welcoming, and breakfast is very good.
reviews.title: Ok hotel - seems like it has seen better days though

reviews.text: However, it appears that the hotel has seen better days and that it is currently suffering from lack of maintenance. Some things are small - i.e. the marble table top on my nightstand had become unattached from the rest of the piece. Other things are larger - i.e. multiple leaks in the roof of the hotel so that water drips into the lobby and restaurant areas and through some of the air ducts. My colleague had a top floor room and had quite an issue with this. My room was totally fine though. There is also just an air of shabbiness around the edges. I understand that this is an older property in the area, but it isn't THAT old.
reviews.title: Great location when visiting Vera Cruz. The hotel is located inside of the a mall and adjacent to the convention center.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also, prior to my stay, I had a couple questions, so I sent 3 or 4 emails trying to get an answer, but never received a reply to any of them. That is definitely a negative - and my emails were in Spanish, so it wasn't a language issue.
reviews.title: It used to be a lot better

reviews.text: As for location - it was convenient to a lot of things, but unless you want to go to the mall, it really isn't in a walkable location, being surrounded by large roads. For access by taxi though, it is really easy.
reviews.title: Good Breakfast

reviews.text: The service in Vera Cruz is outstanding they go out of their way to please you. The hotel needs a little updating and The beach in Vera Cruz is not really a swimming beach it is more of a Port City. We enjoyed our stay at the Galleria Plaza and the service is definitely 5 stars.
reviews.title: Excellent Choice for Conventions and General Stay

aka: Galeria Plaza Veracruz Hotel Boca Del Rio
